Producer: Sidney Kimmel, Tom Rosenberg, Gary Lucchesi, Jim Tauber
Production Co: Lionsgate Films, Lakeshore Entertainment, Sidney Kimmel Entertainment
Synopsis: After serving 28 years in prison for accidentally killing the son of a crime boss, newly paroled gangster Val (Al Pacino) reunites with his former partners in crime, Doc (Christopher Walken) and Hirsch (Alan Arkin), for a night on the town. As the three men revisit old haunts, reflect on their glory days and try to make up for lost time, one wrestles with a terrible quandary: Doc has orders to kill Val, and time is running out for him to figure out a way out of his dilemma.
Title: Stand Up Guys
